    • Uses of BooleanInputPoll in ccre.chan

      Subinterfaces of BooleanInputPoll in ccre.chan 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  BooleanInput
      A BooleanInput is a way to get the current state of a boolean input, and to subscribe to notifications of changes in the boolean input's value.
      Classes in ccre.chan that implement BooleanInputPoll 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BooleanStatus
      A virtual node that is both a BooleanOutput and a BooleanInput.
